testcase.name: create kittens and validate
testcase.system-out: * url demoBaseUrl ......................................................... passed * def creator = read('../callarray/kitten-create.feature') ................ passed * def kittensFn = ......................................................... passed * def kittens = call kittensFn 5 .......................................... passed * def result1 = call creator kittens ...................................... passed * def created = $result1[*].response ...................................... passed * assert created.length == 5 .............................................. passed * match each created == { id: '#number', name: '#regex Kit[0-4]' } ........ passed * match created[*].name contains [ 'Kit0', 'Kit1', 'Kit2', 'Kit3', 'Kit4' ] . passed * def result2 = call read('get-cat.feature') created ...................... passed * match result2[*].response contains created .............................. passed
